Sorry that I hardly posted today, I spent the day with my family (some lousy 
time, eh?), mostly doing various chores.

Also, about the mobile base thing: Having talked it over with KSLawdogg, me 
and him have decided that it's ok to have ships such as Phobia's (with CR 
chambers), as long as it is notbeing used as a base. This is only a temporary 
decition, though, because (mostly because of me forgetting to), I havn't 
talked with Talon or Inferno about this, so we'll see when I talk with them.
